excerpt.rendered:
Firm, thorough and results driven, this multi-tasking no-nonsense facial is crafted specifically to treat male skin concerns, whilst it melts away stress and tension.

Customised to your specific skin type to deliver optimal results, this facial includes a double cleanse, exfoliation and extended facial massage with bioactive oils, leaving skin brighter, hydrated, firmed and revitalised. For those with a beard, a botanical mask treatment is applied to condition and nourish.
